name: staff_training_journey_evaluation
description: Test the staff training and white-label solution journey

steps.expected: Staff training system should load with advanced learning features and platform administration guides

steps.action: Fill login form with username 'admin' and password 'admin123'
steps.expected: Should authenticate admin user and grant access to training system
Should display advanced learning features and platform administration training materials
White-label solution should load for SkillBridge Academy to license to other educational institutions
Should display white-label configuration options for licensing to other educational institutions
Business scaling tools should load with growth planning and expansion features
Should display growth planning and expansion features for business scaling
Global delivery system should load with internationalization and localization features
Should display internationalization and localization features for global course delivery
Enterprise features should load with SSO, compliance tracking, and advanced security
